:py:mod:`CodonU.extractor.extract_cds`
======================================

.. py:module:: CodonU.extractor.extract_cds


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   CodonU.extractor.extract_cds.extract_cds



.. py:function:: extract_cds(record: Bio.SeqRecord.SeqRecord, feature_location: Bio.SeqFeature.FeatureLocation) -> Bio.SeqRecord.SeqRecord

   Returns the CDS as a Sequence Record object

   :param record: Original Sequence Record object from where the CDS is to be extracted
   :param feature_location: The location of CDS
   :return: The new Sequence Record object containing the CDS
